## Matrix4x4.getFarPlaneWidth() method

Get width of the far clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFarPlaneWidth(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

Width of the far clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that this is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
